verses.verse: Ye shall make <WH6213> you no idols <WH457> nor graven image <WH6459>, neither rear you up <WH6965> a standing image <WH4676>, neither shall ye set up <WH5414> any image <WH4906> of stone <WH68> in your land <WH776>, to bow down <WH7812> unto it: for I am the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430>. standing: or, pillar image of: or, figured stone: Heb. a stone of picture
Ye shall keep <WH8104> my sabbaths <WH7676>, and reverence <WH3372> my sanctuary <WH4720>: I am the LORD <WH3068>.
If ye walk <WH3212> in my statutes <WH2708>, and keep <WH8104> my commandments <WH4687>, and do <WH6213> them;

Then I will give <WH5414> you rain <WH1653> in due season <WH6256>, and the land <WH776> shall yield <WH5414> her increase <WH2981>, and the trees <WH6086> of the field <WH7704> shall yield <WH5414> their fruit <WH6529>.

And your threshing <WH1786> shall reach <WH5381> unto the vintage <WH1210>, and the vintage <WH1210> shall reach <WH5381> unto the sowing time <WH2233>: and ye shall eat <WH398> your bread <WH3899> to the full <WH7648>, and dwell <WH3427> in your land <WH776> safely <WH983>.

And I will give <WH5414> peace <WH7965> in the land <WH776>, and ye shall lie down <WH7901>, and none shall make you afraid <WH2729>: and I will rid <WH7673> evil <WH7451> beasts <WH2416> out of the land <WH776>, neither shall the sword <WH2719> go <WH5674> through your land <WH776>. rid: Heb. cause to cease
And ye shall chase <WH7291> your enemies <WH341>, and they shall fall <WH5307> before <WH6440> you by the sword <WH2719>.

And five <WH2568> of you shall chase <WH7291> an hundred <WH3967>, and an hundred <WH3967> of you shall put ten thousand <WH7233> to flight <WH7291>: and your enemies <WH341> shall fall <WH5307> before <WH6440> you by the sword <WH2719>.
For I will have respect <WH6437> unto you, and make you fruitful <WH6509>, and multiply <WH7235> you, and establish <WH6965> my covenant <WH1285> with you.
And ye shall eat <WH398> old store <WH3462>, and bring forth <WH3318> the old <WH3465> because <WH6440> of the new <WH2319>.
And I will set <WH5414> my tabernacle <WH4908> among <WH8432> you: and my soul <WH5315> shall not abhor <WH1602> you.
And I will walk <WH1980> among <WH8432> you, and will be <WH1961> your God <WH430>, and ye shall be <WH1961> my people <WH5971>.

I am the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430>, which brought you forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, that ye should not be their bondmen <WH5650>; and I have broken <WH7665> the bands <WH4133> of your yoke <WH5923>, and made you go <WH3212> upright <WH6968>.
But if ye will not hearken <WH8085> unto me, and will not do <WH6213> all these commandments <WH4687>;

And if ye shall despise <WH3988> my statutes <WH2708>, or if your soul <WH5315> abhor <WH1602> my judgments <WH4941>, so that ye will not do <WH6213> all my commandments <WH4687>, but that ye break <WH6565> my covenant <WH1285>:

I also will do <WH6213> this unto you; I will even appoint <WH6485> over you terror <WH928>, consumption <WH7829>, and the burning ague <WH6920>, that shall consume <WH3615> the eyes <WH5869>, and cause sorrow <WH1727> of heart <WH5315>: and ye shall sow <WH2232> your seed <WH2233> in vain <WH7385>, for your enemies <WH341> shall eat <WH398> it. over: Heb. upon

And I will set <WH5414> my face <WH6440> against you, and ye shall be slain <WH5062> before <WH6440> your enemies <WH341>: they that hate <WH8130> you shall reign <WH7287> over you; and ye shall flee <WH5127> when none pursueth <WH7291> you.
And if ye will not yet <WH5704> for all this hearken <WH8085> unto me, then I will punish <WH3256> you seven times <WH7651> more <WH3254> for your sins <WH2403>.
And I will break <WH7665> the pride <WH1347> of your power <WH5797>; and I will make <WH5414> your heaven <WH8064> as iron <WH1270>, and your earth <WH776> as brass <WH5154>:

And your strength <WH3581> shall be spent <WH8552> in vain <WH7385>: for your land <WH776> shall not yield <WH5414> her increase <WH2981>, neither shall the trees <WH6086> of the land <WH776> yield <WH5414> their fruits <WH6529>.

And if ye walk <WH3212> contrary <WH7147> unto me, and will <WH14> not hearken <WH8085> unto me; I will bring <WH3254> seven times <WH7651> more <WH3254> plagues <WH4347> upon you according to your sins <WH2403>. contrary: or, at all adventures with me

I will also send <WH7971> wild <WH7704> beasts <WH2416> among you, which shall rob you of your children <WH7921>, and destroy <WH3772> your cattle <WH929>, and make you few in number <WH4591>; and your high ways <WH1870> shall be desolate <WH8074>.
And if ye will not be reformed <WH3256> by me by these things, but will walk <WH1980> contrary <WH7147> unto me;
Then will I also walk <WH1980> contrary <WH7147> unto you, and will punish <WH5221> you yet <WH1571> seven times <WH7651> for your sins <WH2403>.

And I will bring <WH935> a sword <WH2719> upon you, that shall avenge <WH5358> the quarrel <WH5359> of my covenant <WH1285>: and when ye are gathered together <WH622> within <WH413> your cities <WH5892>, I will send <WH7971> the pestilence <WH1698> among <WH8432> you; and ye shall be delivered <WH5414> into the hand <WH3027> of the enemy <WH341>.

And when I have broken <WH7665> the staff <WH4294> of your bread <WH3899>, ten <WH6235> women <WH802> shall bake <WH644> your bread <WH3899> in one <WH259> oven <WH8574>, and they shall deliver <WH7725> you your bread <WH3899> again <WH7725> by weight <WH4948>: and ye shall eat <WH398>, and not be satisfied <WH7646>.
And if ye will not for all this <WH2063> hearken <WH8085> unto me, but walk <WH1980> contrary <WH7147> unto me;
Then I will walk <WH1980> contrary <WH7147> unto you also in fury <WH2534>; and I, even <WH637> I, will chastise <WH3256> you seven times <WH7651> for your sins <WH2403>.
And ye shall eat <WH398> the flesh <WH1320> of your sons <WH1121>, and the flesh <WH1320> of your daughters <WH1323> shall ye eat <WH398>.

And I will destroy <WH8045> your high places <WH1116>, and cut down <WH3772> your images <WH2553>, and cast <WH5414> your carcases <WH6297> upon the carcases <WH6297> of your idols <WH1544>, and my soul <WH5315> shall abhor <WH1602> you.

And I will make <WH5414> your cities <WH5892> waste <WH2723>, and bring <WH8074> your sanctuaries <WH4720> unto desolation <WH8074>, and I will not smell <WH7306> the savour <WH7381> of your sweet odours <WH5207>.
And I will bring <WH8074> the land <WH776> into desolation <WH8074>: and your enemies <WH341> which dwell <WH3427> therein shall be astonished <WH8074> at it.

And I will scatter <WH2219> you among the heathen <WH1471>, and will draw out <WH7324> a sword <WH2719> after <WH310> you: and your land <WH776> shall be desolate <WH8077>, and your cities <WH5892> waste <WH2723>.

Then shall the land <WH776> enjoy <WH7521> her sabbaths <WH7676>, as long <WH3117> as it lieth desolate <WH8074>, and ye be in your enemies' <WH341> land <WH776>; even then shall the land <WH776> rest <WH7673>, and enjoy <WH7521> her sabbaths <WH7676>.
As long as <WH3117> it lieth desolate <WH8074> it shall rest <WH7673>; because it did not rest <WH7673> in your sabbaths <WH7676>, when ye dwelt <WH3427> upon it.

And upon them that are left <WH7604> alive of you I will send <WH935> a faintness <WH4816> into their hearts <WH3824> in the lands <WH776> of their enemies <WH341>; and the sound <WH6963> of a shaken <WH5086> leaf <WH5929> shall chase <WH7291> them; and they shall flee <WH5127>, as fleeing <WH4499> from a sword <WH2719>; and they shall fall <WH5307> when none pursueth <WH7291>. shaken: Heb. driven

And they shall fall <WH3782> one <WH376> upon another <WH251>, as it were before <WH6440> a sword <WH2719>, when none pursueth <WH7291>: and ye shall have no power to stand <WH8617> before <WH6440> your enemies <WH341>.
And ye shall perish <WH6> among the heathen <WH1471>, and the land <WH776> of your enemies <WH341> shall eat you up <WH398>.

And they that are left <WH7604> of you shall pine away <WH4743> in their iniquity <WH5771> in your enemies' <WH341> lands <WH776>; and also in the iniquities <WH5771> of their fathers <WH1> shall they pine away <WH4743> with them.

If they shall confess <WH3034> their iniquity <WH5771>, and the iniquity <WH5771> of their fathers <WH1>, with their trespass <WH4604> which they trespassed <WH4603> against me, and that also they have walked <WH1980> contrary <WH7147> unto me;

And that I also have walked <WH3212> contrary <WH7147> unto them, and have brought <WH935> them into the land <WH776> of their enemies <WH341>; if then <WH176> their uncircumcised <WH6189> hearts <WH3824> be humbled <WH3665>, and they then accept <WH7521> of the punishment of their iniquity <WH5771>:

Then will I remember <WH2142> my covenant <WH1285> with Jacob <WH3290>, and also my covenant <WH1285> with Isaac <WH3327>, and also my covenant <WH1285> with Abraham <WH85> will I remember <WH2142>; and I will remember <WH2142> the land <WH776>.

The land <WH776> also shall be left <WH5800> of them, and shall enjoy <WH7521> her sabbaths <WH7676>, while she lieth desolate <WH8074> without them: and they shall accept <WH7521> of the punishment of their iniquity <WH5771>: because <WH3282>, even because <WH3282> they despised <WH3988> my judgments <WH4941>, and because their soul <WH5315> abhorred <WH1602> my statutes <WH2708>.

And yet <WH637> for all that <WH2063>, when they be <WH1571> in the land <WH776> of their enemies <WH341>, I will not cast them away <WH3988>, neither will I abhor <WH1602> them, to destroy them utterly <WH3615>, and to break <WH6565> my covenant <WH1285> with them: for I am the LORD <WH3068> their God <WH430>.

But I will for their sakes remember <WH2142> the covenant <WH1285> of their ancestors <WH7223>, whom I brought forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> in the sight <WH5869> of the heathen <WH1471>, that I might be their God <WH430>: I am the LORD <WH3068>.

These are the statutes <WH2706> and judgments <WH4941> and laws <WH8451>, which the LORD <WH3068> made <WH5414> between him and the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> in mount <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514> by the hand <WH3027> of Moses <WH4872>.
